content.text: I am a software engineer but my true passion is geocaching.
Never heard of that ! What is it ?
It's an outdoor treasure hunt game where you use a gps device to find hidden containers called geocaches.
That sounds really fun. I love being outside.
Yeah, it's a great way to get exercise and see new places.
Do you have a favorite geocache you've found?
I have a few, but my favorite one was a cache that was hidden in a tree.
That's awesome ! I love climbing trees.
Me too ! It was a great challenge to find it.
I'm not sure I'm brave enough to climb a tree , but it sounds really fun.
You should try it sometime ! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for telling me about geocaching. It sounds like a really cool hobby.
You're welcome ! I'm glad I could tell you about it.
